citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have an attending veterinarian (AV). A representative from SeaQuest Roseville informed Animal
Care on April 24, 2024 that their current AV would be resigning as of April 30, 2024. The facility failed to retain another AV
before the AV departed on April 30th. Lack of an AV does not ensure that appropriate and adequate veterinary care is
being provided to the animals at the facility. Correct by May 15, 2024.

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility has an environmental enhancement plan to promote the psychological well-being of the birds however, the
plan is not approved by the attending veterinarian. Having an unapproved environmental enhancement plan does not
ensure that adequate and appropriate measures to promote the psychological well-being of the birds is being provided.
The plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian. Correct by May 15, 2024.

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
A large amount of mouse feces was observed along the walls in the office space that currently houses a golden parakeet.
The facility contracts a pest control service and though it has been successful in reducing the number of mice caught a
pest control issue remains. Pests such as mice can spread disease and contaminate food, surfaces and animal housing
areas. A safe and effective program for the control of mammalian pests must be established and maintained to promote
the health and well-being of the birds and reduce contamination by pests in animal areas. Correct by May 31, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the General Manager.
n

narrative:
2.40(a) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The facility does not have an attending veterinarian (AV). A representative from SeaQuest Roseville informed Animal 
Care on April 24, 2024 that their current AV would be resigning as of April 30, 2024. The facility failed to retain another AV 
before the AV departed on April 30th. Lack of an AV does not ensure that appropriate and adequate veterinary care is 
being provided to the animals at the facility. Correct by May 15, 2024. 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility has an environmental enhancement plan to promote the psychological well-being of the birds however, the 
plan is not approved by the attending veterinarian. Having an unapproved environmental enhancement plan does not 
ensure that adequate and appropriate measures to promote the psychological well-being of the birds is being provided. 
The plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian. Correct by May 15, 2024. 
3.158(d) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
A large amount of mouse feces was observed along the walls in the office space that currently houses a golden parakeet. 
The facility contracts a pest control service and though it has been successful in reducing the number of mice caught a 
pest control issue remains. Pests such as mice can spread disease and contaminate food, surfaces and animal housing 
areas. A safe and effective program for the control of mammalian pests must be established and maintained to promote 
the health and well-being of the birds and reduce contamination by pests in animal areas. Correct by May 31, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the General Manager. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG

species.scientific: Ara, Anodorhynchus, Primolius, Diopsittaca spp hybrid
